infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Truck Driver App saves delivery and inspection photos to your photo library so you can keep records.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Truck Driver App uses the camera so you can take pictures of loads, damage, receipts, and delivery proof.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Truck Driver App uses the microphone so you can record quick voice notes about loads and stops.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Truck Driver App uses your location while you're using the app to log your current stop and help record mileage.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Truck Driver App uses your location in the background to track routes, mileage, and delivery stops for your driving log.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Truck Driver App needs continuous location updates to keep trip history and stop locations, even when the app is not on screen.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos so you can attach delivery and truck inspection pictures.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Truck Driver App to use your location to track routes, mileage, and delivery stops even in the background.
